reference.title: apiPackage
reference.shortdesc: The <apiPackage> element provides the name of the API package, module, public class members, namespace and all the elements that are necessary to describe its components.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <apiPackage> contain a list of items with first sentence summaries for this API items.

The <apiPackage> element requires an ID attribute as an anchor point. This ID is the target for references by <link> or <xref> elements (conref and keyref attributes), and for other internal specialization elements that refer to this <apiPackage> content. Use a unique key such as fully qualified package name for the named API reference.
